name: CPTripPreviewTextConfiguration
desc: A configuration object for changing the button titles on a trip preview.

items.name: init(startButtonTitle: String?, additionalRoutesButtonTitle: String?, overviewButtonTitle: String?)
items.desc: Creates a trip preview text configuration object.

items.name: var startButtonTitle: String?
items.desc: The title displayed on the start button.

items.name: var additionalRoutesButtonTitle: String?
items.desc: The title displayed on the routes button.

items.name: var overviewButtonTitle: String?
items.desc: The title displayed on the overview button.
